<UiScreen infoLevel="Normal">
<Title>CPAPI_UISCR_TEMPLATE_WHICH</Title>
<Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./UIJOB_TEST.xml"></Op> <Op type="Back" action="./UIJOB_TEST.xml"></Op> </Operations>

</UiScreen>
